title: Baron Santa Hat Buff
body: Just a personal thought, Riot should add that the team that kills baron gets Santa hats while they have Baron Buff.

replies.body:
what if they just gave Baron a santa hat? and dressed baron up as santa? then dragon became santa on a sleigh?

or when you kill baron everyone on your team is moving on a slay? this would be amazing with the santa gragas skin
This would be extremely hard to do for the riot team as the have to add a Santa hat model to EVERY CHAMPION. It would take alot of time and texturing would be an issue

All you have to do is draw a santa hat.

It's not even that detailed.
If they can do it with Draven's Face they can do it with Santa hats. Maraudaur?
But what's the point when everyone will be playing with the Poros?

Riot denied it from me when I mentioned this on Surr@20.

They said it's not really worth the effort.
That sounds like a good idea and would set the mood for chirstmas

While it would be amazing it's way too short notice for this year.

Would be easier just to make christmas poros follow everyone that has baron buff.

Cool idea for next year though.
You have my full support with this excellent idea.
